title: Chosen Wolf
description: Fate is a b*tch and she will always force your hand.Solidifying my mate bond with Aiden was supposed to be a happy occasion. Instead, our union unleashed a curse, and now our survival hangs in the balance.As I try to right the wrongs of the past, the Hallowed Guild is determined to get in the way. My next steps are clear, but every move I make puts those around me in danger.Too much has happened for my destiny to be changed. I must embrace my role to untie the great divide between wolf shifter and witch. My mate and my people need me, and I can't let them down. My life isn't the one forfeit if I fail.If you can't get enough of books by K.F. Breene, Kelly St. Claire, Annette Marie, Shannon Mayer, Leia Stone, Jaymin Eve, and Laura Thalassa, then you'll love this paranormal romance.
author: Jen L. Grey
